name: Hiking Simulator 2018
description: Put on your hiking boots and get ready to explore a gigantic winter landscape!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64 bit Processor: 2.0GHZ or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 950 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64 bit Processor: 3.2 GHz or better Memory: 16 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
